meanings.definition: Make (something) look more attractive by adding extra items or images to it.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys decorating her room with colorful posters.
meanings.sent2: I am decorating the cake with icing and sprinkles.
meanings.sent3: He was decorating his bicycle with ribbons for the parade.
meanings.sent4: The artist was decorating the canvas with vibrant strokes of paint.
meanings.sent5: The garden was decorating itself with blooming flowers.

meanings.definition: Adorn or embellish (something) with attractive items.
meanings.sent1: They are decorating the Christmas tree with shiny ornaments.
meanings.sent2: The bride was decorating her hair with delicate flowers.
meanings.sent3: The cat was decorating the house with its playful antics.
meanings.sent4: The chef was decorating the dessert with a drizzle of chocolate sauce.
meanings.sent5: The sky was decorating the evening with a palette of colors.
